item.title: 澳大利亚 6 月零售额大幅增长，原因是折扣和任天堂 Switch 吸引了购物者
item.description: 由于任天堂 Switch 2 的推出和财政年度末的打折活动吸引了消费者重返商店，澳大利亚 6 月份的零售销售额激增，尽管整个第二季度的销售量并不乐观。【原文：Australian retail sales surged in June as the launch of Nintendo's Switch 2 and discounting at the end of the financial year drew consumers back to the shops, though sales volumes for the second quarter as a whole were subdued.】

item.title: 出口疲软，中国工厂活动降温
item.description: 周四的一项官方调查显示，7月份中国制造业活动连续第四个月萎缩，这表明在美国提高关税之前出口激增的势头已开始减弱，而国内需求依然低迷。【原文：China's manufacturing activity shrank for a fourth straight month in July, an official survey showed on Thursday, suggesting a surge in exports ahead of higher U.S. tariffs has started to fade while domestic demand remained sluggish.】

item.title: 三星电子称韩美贸易协议减少了不确定性
item.description: 三星电子周四表示，韩美贸易协议将减少不确定性。【原文：Samsung Electronics said on Thursday that the South Korea-U.S. trade deal would reduce uncertainty.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，OpenAI 的年化收入达到 120 亿美元
item.description: 据《信息》周三援引消息人士的话报道，聊天软件制造商 OpenAI 在今年前七个月的收入翻了一倍，年化收入达到 120 亿美元。【原文：ChatGPT-maker OpenAI roughly doubled its revenue in the first seven months of the year, reaching $12 billion in annualized revenue, the Information reported on Wednesday citing a source.】

item.title: 韩美达成贸易协议后韩国汽车股下跌
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）表示，作为贸易协议的一部分，美国将对包括汽车在内的韩国进口产品征收15%的关税，此后韩国现代汽车（Hyundai Motor）和起亚汽车（Kia Corp）股价周四下跌。【原文：Shares of South Korean automakers Hyundai Motor and Kia Corp fell on Thursday after U.S. President Donald Trump said the U.S. will charge a 15% tariff on imports from South Korea, including autos, as part of a trade deal.】

item.title: 中国制造业采购经理人指数（PMI）显示，7月份中国工厂活动连续第四个月萎缩
item.description: 周四的一项官方调查显示，中国制造业活动在7月份连续第四个月萎缩，这表明在美国提高关税之前出口激增的势头已开始减弱，而国内需求依然低迷。【原文：China's manufacturing activity shrank for a fourth month in July, an official survey showed on Thursday, suggesting that a surge in exports ahead of higher U.S. tariffs has started to fade while domestic demand remains sluggish.】

item.title: 美联储不急于放宽利率，美元迎来年内首次月度上涨
item.description: 在美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）在备受关注的政策决定中坚持对利率采取耐心的态度，并对何时可能下调利率没有提供什么见解之后，美元周四一度触及两个月高点。【原文：The dollar flirted with a two-month peak on Thursday after Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell stuck to his patient approach on rates in a closely watched policy decision and offered little insight on when they could be lowered.】

item.title: 特朗普掺水的铜关税几乎压垮 Comex 溢价
item.description: 伦敦金属交易所的基准铜价在周四开盘时上涨，因为市场继续回吐美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）缩减美国对铜征收关税后一度高涨的铜价溢价。【原文：Benchmark copper prices on the London Metals Exchange rose at the open on Thursday as markets continued to claw back the once-mighty U.S. copper price premium in response to the scaled-down U.S. copper tariffs imposed by President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 特朗普关税威胁引发供应担忧，油价连续第四天上涨
item.description: 油价周四连续第四天上涨，原因是美国总统唐纳德-特朗普推动迅速解决乌克兰战争，并威胁对购买俄罗斯石油的国家征收关税，投资者担心供应短缺。【原文：Oil prices gained for a fourth straight day on Thursday, as investors worried about supply shortages amid U.S. President Donald Trump's push for a swift resolution to the war in Ukraine and threats of tariffs on countries buying Russian oil.】

item.title: 美联储对降息保持缄默迫使市场重新审视前景
item.description: 尽管政治压力无情，美联储仍决定避免发出即将降息的信号，这凸显了其普遍的谨慎态度，并迫使投资者降低了对下一次政策会议上放松政策的预期。【原文：The Federal Reserve's decision to avoid signaling imminent rate cuts despite relentless political pressure underscores its prevailing caution and has forced investors to dial back expectations for an easing at the next policy meeting.】

item.title: 三星第二季度利润下降 55%，原因是人工智能芯片销售疲软，中国市场受限
item.description: 三星电子（Samsung Electronics）周四公布的第二季度营业利润下降了 55%，原因是高带宽存储芯片出货延迟和美国对中国先进芯片销售的出口限制继续拖累其关键的半导体部门。【原文：Samsung Electronics reported on Thursday a 55% drop in second-quarter operating profit as delays in high-bandwidth memory chip shipments and U.S. export curbs on advanced chip sales to China continued to drag on its key semiconductor division.】

item.title: 联合太平洋公司和诺福克南方公司计划在 1 月 29 日前提交合并申请
item.description: 美国地面运输委员会（Surface Transportation Board）周三表示，联合太平洋公司（Union Pacific）和诺福克南方公司（Norfolk Southern）已正式提交了合并意向通知书，从而触发了美国监管部门对这两大铁路公司拟以 850 亿美元进行合并的审查程序。【原文：The Surface Transportation Board said on Wednesday that Union Pacific and Norfolk Southern have formally filed a notice of intent to combine, triggering the U.S. regulatory review process for a proposed $85 billion merger between the two major railroads.】

item.title: 贝森特称特朗普婴儿账户是 "社会保障私有化的后门
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周三在布赖特巴特（Breitbart）主办的一次活动上发表讲话，将唐纳德-特朗普总统本月签署成为法律的法案中的新储蓄账户比喻为 "社会保障私有化的后门"。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent on Wednesday likened new savings accounts in a bill President Donald Trump this month signed into law to "a backdoor for privatizing Social Security," speaking at an event sponsored by Breitbart.】

item.title: 巴拿马审计师提起诉讼，要求撤销长江和记控制的港口合同
item.description: 巴拿马总审计长阿内尔-弗洛雷斯（Anel Flores）周三表示，他已向巴拿马最高法院提起诉讼，反对由香港长江和记控制的一家当地公司持有的巴拿马运河附近港口运营合同。【原文：Panama's comptroller general, Anel Flores, said on Wednesday he had filed suit to the nation's Supreme Court against a contract to operate ports near the Panama Canal, held by a local firm controlled by Hong Kong-based CK Hutchison .】

item.title: Grab Holdings 季度收入超出预期
item.description: Grab Holdings周三公布的第二季度营收超出华尔街预期，尽管经济形势不明朗，但消费者仍增加了对其打车和食品配送平台的消费。【原文：Grab Holdings beat Wall Street expectations for second-quarter revenue on Wednesday, with consumers hiking spend on its ride-hailing and food delivery platform despite economic uncertainty.】

item.title: Figma 在美国首次公开募股中融资 12 亿美元，定价高于发行区间
item.description: 设计软件公司 Figma 及其部分股东在美国首次公开募股中筹集了 12.2 亿美元，其股票定价高于预期范围。【原文：Design software firm Figma and some of its shareholders raised $1.22 billion in the design software firm's U.S. initial public offering after its shares were priced above the expected range.】

item.title: 艾伯维洽谈收购吉尔伽美什制药公司
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三援引知情人士的话报道，制药商艾伯维正在洽谈收购私人控股的精神健康治疗公司吉尔伽美什制药公司（Gilgamesh Pharmaceuticals），交易价值约为 10 亿美元。【原文：Drugmaker AbbVie is in talks to acquire privately-held mental health therapeutics company Gilgamesh Pharmaceuticals in a deal worth about $1 billion, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: F5 预测企业云需求将带来乐观的季度业绩
item.description: 由于企业云服务需求强劲，F5 公司周三预计第四季度业绩将高于华尔街预期，股价在盘后交易中上涨 9%。【原文：F5 on Wednesday forecast fourth-quarter results above Wall Street estimates on strong demand for its enterprise cloud services, sending shares up 9% in extended trading.】

item.title: 云计算需求稳定，泰勒科技季度收入超预期
item.description: 泰勒科技公司（Tyler Technologies）周三公布的第二季度营收超出华尔街预期，主要得益于对其 IT 和基于云的软件服务的稳定需求。【原文：Tyler Technologies beat Wall Street expectations for second-quarter revenue on Wednesday, helped by steady demand for its IT and cloud-based software services.】

item.title: 隐适美制造商 Align Technology 因需求疲软下调年度收入预期
item.description: 由于宏观经济的不确定性影响了牙科产品的需求，牙齿矫正器制造商 Align Technology 周三下调了年度收入增长预期，导致该公司股价在盘后交易中下跌约 30%。【原文：Teeth aligner maker Align Technology on Wednesday cut its annual revenue growth forecast as macroeconomic uncertainties weighed on demand for its dental products, sending the company's shares about 30% lower in extended trading.】

item.title: 鲍威尔称美联储在政策辩论中不考虑政府利率成本
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周三表示，央行在制定利率政策时不应该考虑政府的融资需求。【原文：U.S. Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell on Wednesday said there is no place for the central bank to consider government financing needs when setting interest rate policy.】

item.title: 微软和 Meta 推动人工智能股票上涨 5000 亿美元
item.description: 周三晚些时候，微软和 Meta Platforms 发布的季报显示，在新兴技术领域的大规模投资正在获得回报，华尔街的人工智能重量级公司的股票市值合计增加了 5 万亿美元。【原文：Wall Street's AI heavyweights added a combined half a trillion dollars in stock market value late on Wednesday after quarterly reports from Microsoft and Meta Platforms showed massive investments in the emerging technology were paying off.】

item.title: 巴西部分主要出口产品免受特朗普新关税 40% 的影响
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周三签署了一项行政命令，对巴西出口产品征收 40% 的关税，使巴西的关税总额达到 50%。不过，巴西的一些主要出口产品被免于征税。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump signed an executive order on Wednesday imposing a 40% tariff on Brazilian exports, bringing the country's total tariff amount to 50%. Some of Brazil's major exports, however, were exempted from the tax.】

item.title: 特朗普称美国将对韩国进口产品征收 15%的关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周三表示，美国将对从韩国进口的商品征收 15%的关税，作为与亚洲贸易伙伴协议的一部分，以避免征收更高的关税。【原文：President Donald Trump said on Wednesday the United States would charge a 15% tariff on imports from South Korea as part of an agreement with the Asian trading partner that avoids even higher levies.】

item.title: 美国全国餐饮协会游说反对美国加征关税
item.description: 全美餐饮协会周二致函美国贸易代表贾米森-格里尔，表示对新关税的可能性 "极为担忧"。【原文：The National Restaurant Association said it was “extremely concerned” about the possibility of new tariffs in a letter sent to U.S. Trade Representative Jamieson Greer on Tuesday.】

item.title: 数据中心需求稳定，Equinix 上调年度业绩预期
item.description: 数据中心公司 Equinix 周三上调了对年度业绩的预期，表明投资人工智能解决方案的企业客户需求稳定。【原文：Data center firm Equinix raised its forecast for annual results on Wednesday, signaling steady demand from its enterprise customers investing in AI solutions.】

item.title: 交易日：鲍威尔不急于削减
item.description: 了解推动全球市场的各种力量【原文：Making sense of the forces driving global markets】

item.title: 保德信金融公司利润因 PGIM 和国际业务强劲而增长
item.description: 保德信金融公司（Prudential Financial）周三公布第二季度利润增长，主要得益于投资管理费用的增长和国际业务承销业绩的良好表现。【原文：Prudential Financial on Wednesday reported a rise in second-quarter profit, lifted by stronger fees in investment management and favorable underwriting in its international businesses.】

item.title: 数据存储需求强劲，西部数据季度收入超出预期
item.description: 受益于企业采用云计算后数据存储产品订单强劲，西部数据周三公布的第四季度营收超出预期，股价在盘后交易中上涨超过 4%。【原文：Western Digital beat expectations for fourth-quarter revenue on Wednesday, benefiting from strong orders for its data storage products as enterprises adopt cloud computing, sending its shares up more than 4% in extended trading.】

item.title: 日本央行将谨慎乐观，保持利率稳定，因为贸易阴霾已经散去
item.description: 日本央行周四将维持利率稳定，并对经济前景持谨慎乐观态度，此前东京与华盛顿达成的贸易协议消除了围绕日本脆弱复苏的一些不确定性。【原文：The Bank of Japan is set to keep interest rates steady on Thursday and offer a cautiously optimistic view on the economic outlook, after Tokyo's trade deal with Washington cleared some uncertainty surrounding its fragile recovery.】
